content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello, Yi-Nuo Wang. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment in Magdeburg to be a comfortable and convenient place to live. Let's indeed discuss the rental price. How much were you thinking of offering?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I am a student and I am looking for a place with the lowest price possible. Therefore, I would like to rent the apartment for 300 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 300 Euro per month is much lower than my asking price. My apartment is brand new and located in the city center, which is a highly sought-after area. I believe it deserves a higher rent. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. The apartment is indeed in a great location. Considering the location and condition of the apartment, I would offer 400 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Your offer of 400 Euro per month is more aligned with the value of the apartment. However, I'm looking for a tenant who appreciates the quality and convenience of this property. Would you be willing to go higher?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understanding the value of the apartment, I would like to offer 450 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Your offer of 450 Euro per month is closer to my expectations. The apartment is not only new and well-located but also close to all amenities. Would you be willing to go up to 500 Euro per month to secure this apartment? It would be a fair reflection of the market value and the quality of the property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the market value and the quality of the property, I agree to the price of 500 Euro per month!
